name: 德韦恩·R·格兰特
name_full: 德韦恩·R·格兰特 Dwayne R. Grant

last_movies.title: 夜魔侠：重生 第一季

introduction: Dwayne R. Grant is an American actor in film and television. Known for his work on television shows such as Shattered, Homicide City and Murder Tapes. He has starred in films such as "Decay" where he takes on the role of a psychologist who is hell bent on controlling the human mind by systematically breaking his patients mental health for hours on end. "Cracked", a Spike Lee backed film that is directed by Lin Que Ayoung, takes place in 1985 during the rise of the drug epidemic. He plays Michael, a loving husband and father to his family, but what unfolds may change their lives forever.
